Detailed Description

Declaration and Control of service.

Use:

  • Create a ControlServer, with the name for the service registration
  • add Variable, input, output ...
  • register the service (StartServer)
  • Process the control message by using ProcessMessages or in a new thread by calling one time StartThreadProcessMsg

Author:
Sebastien Pesnel

Definition at line 86 of file ControlServer.h.

Launch a server for the control and Register the service.

Launch a Tcp Server on a free port. Register the service (DNS-SD)

true if the tcp server is correctly launched and the service registered

void ControlServer::StartThreadProcessMsg (  ) 

Message processing in a thread.

run a thread where queries to the server are processed. In this case, the user don't need to use the methods ProcessMessages() and WaitForMessage(). call ProcessMessages when messages wait.

See also:
ProcessMessages, WaitForMessage

00421     // if( strcmp((const char*)node->name, "controlQuery") == 0 )
00422     if ( ControlQueryValidator.ValidateDoc(msg->doc) )
00423     {
00424         SimpleString id;
00425         xmlAttrPtr attr = XMLMessage::FindAttribute("id", node);
00426         if(attr)
00427         { id = SimpleString((const char*)attr->children->content);}
00428 
00429         bool ReplyAnAnswer = true;      // default
00430         SimpleString str;
00431 
00432         if(node->children == NULL)
00433         {
00434             //global description
00435             GenerateGlobalShortDescription(str);
00436         }
00437         else
00438         {
00439             // more precise request
00440             xmlNodePtr cur_node = node->children;
00441             for(; cur_node; cur_node = cur_node->next)
00442             {
00443                 SimpleString name = (const char*)(cur_node->name);
00444                 //std::cerr << "tag name="<<(*it)->name <<"\n";
00445                 if( name == InOutputAttribute::input_str.GetStr() ||
00446                     name == InOutputAttribute::output_str.GetStr() ||
00447                     name == InOutputAttribute::inoutput_str.GetStr() )
00448                 {
00449                     // OmiscidTrace( " process io : %s \n", (*it)->name.GetStr());
00450                     ProcessInOutputQuery(cur_node, str);
00451                 }
00452                 else if( name == VariableAttribute::VariableStr )
00453                 {
00454                     ProcessVariableQuery(cur_node, msg->pid,  str);
00455                 }
00456                 else if( name == "connect" )
00457                 {
00458                     ProcessConnectQuery(cur_node, str);
00459                 }
00460                 else if( name == "subscribe" )
00461                 {
00462                     ProcessSubscribeQuery(cur_node, msg->pid, true, str);
00463                 }
00464                 else if( name == "unsubscribe" )
00465                 {
00466                     ReplyAnAnswer = false;
00467                     ProcessSubscribeQuery(cur_node, msg->pid, false, str);
00468                 }
00469                 else if( name == "lock" )
00470                 {
00471                     ProcessLockQuery(cur_node, msg->pid, true, str);
00472                 }
00473                 else if( name == "unlock" )
00474                 {
00475                     ProcessLockQuery(cur_node, msg->pid, false, str);
00476                 }
00477                 else if( name == "fullDescription" )
00478                 {
00479                     ProcessFullDescriptionQuery(cur_node, str);
00480                 }
00481                 else
00482                 {
00483                     // Should not appear
00484                     OmiscidError( "unknown tag : %s\n", name.GetStr() );
00485                 }
00486             }
00487             // OmiscidError( "Send : %s \n", str.GetStr());
00488         }
00489 
00490         if ( ReplyAnAnswer == true )
00491         {
00492             str = "<controlAnswer id=\""+id+"\">"
00493                 + str
00494                 + "</controlAnswer>";
00495 
00496     #ifdef DEBUG
00497             if ( ControlAnswerValidator.ValidateDoc( str ) == false )
00498             {
00499                 OmiscidError( "ControlServer::ProcessAMessage: bad ControlAnswer sent.\n" );
00500             }
00501     #endif
00502 
00503             SmartLocker SL_TcpServer_listConnections(TcpServer::listConnections);
00504 
00505             MsgSocket* ms = FindClientFromId( msg->pid );
00506             if( ms != (MsgSocket*)NULL )
00507             {
00508                 try
00509                 {
00510                     ms->Send((int)str.GetLength(), str.GetStr());
00511                 }
00512                 catch( SocketException& e )
00513                 {
00514                     OmiscidError( "Error when responding to a client request : %s (%d)\n", e.msg.GetStr(), e.err );
00515                 }
00516             }
00517         }
00518     }
00519     else
00520     {
00521         OmiscidError( "waited : controlQuery, received='%s'\n", node->name);
00522     }
00523 }
